name: FeedLayout

fields.name: autocollapsePublisher
fields.description: Specifies whether the publisher is collapsed when the page loads (true) or not (false).

fields.name: compactFeed
fields.description: Specifies whether the feed-based page layout uses a compact feed (true) or not (false). If set to true, feed items on the page are collapsed by default, and the feed view has an updated design.

fields.name: feedFilterPosition
fields.description: Indicates where the feed filters list is included in the layout.

fields.name: feedFilters
fields.description: The individual filters displayed in the feed filters list.

fields.name: fullWidthFeed
fields.description: Specifies whether the feed expands horizontally to take up all available space on the page (true) or not (false).

fields.name: hideSidebar
fields.description: Specifies whether the sidebar is hidden (true) or not (false).

fields.name: highlightExternalFeedItems
fields.description: Controls whether to highlight external feed items (true) or not (false).

fields.name: leftComponents
fields.description: The individual components displayed in the left column of the feed view.

fields.name: rightComponents
fields.description: Lists the individual components displayed in the right column of the feed view.

fields.name: useInlineFiltersInConsole
fields.description: Indicates whether to use inline filters in the Salesforce console.

methods.name: clone
methods.description: Makes a duplicate copy of the Metadata.FeedLayout.

description: Represents the values that define the feed view of a feed-based page
